thread.title: Philippines to deport convicted U.S. pedophile wanted for crimes
thread.title_full: Philippines to deport convicted U.S. pedophile wanted for crimes | Fox News

author: foxnews.com
title: Philippines to deport convicted U.S. pedophile wanted for crimes
text:
Published February 22, 2017 FoxNews.com   Email Print A convicted American pedophile-- wanted by U.S. authorities-- was arrested Sunday in the Philippines after allegedly committing a string of crimes, the country's bureau of immigration said.
Cody Dean Turner, 38, was arrested at the request of the U.S. Embassy at his house in the northern city of Tuguegarao, officials said.
More on this... Ex-cop says Philippines leader paid him to kill suspected criminals
